column1: Sub-region sea ice area trends, Northern Canadian Waters, 1968 to 2015

column1: Note: Sea ice is measured during the summer season. For the Northern Canadian Waters, the summer season is defined as the period from June 19 to November 19 for the Hudson Bay domain and from June 25 to October 15 for the Canadian Arctic domain.
Source: Environment and Climate Change Canada (2016) Climate Research Division.
Available on the Canadian Environmental Sustainability Indicators (www.ec.gc.ca/indicateurs-indicators/default.asp?lang=En).
